tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE plant_data(
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plant_name VARCHAR,
    plant_type VARCHAR,
    optimal_temperature FLOAT,
    optimal_humidity FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_data(
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    date TIMESTAMP,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT
);
CREATE TABLE TemperatureData ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, greenhouse_id INT, temperature FLOAT, recorded_at TIMESTAMP )
CREATE TABLE HumidityData ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, greenhouse_id INT, humidity FLOAT, recorded_at TIMESTAMP )
CREATE TABLE Greenhouse ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), location VARCHAR(100) )
CREATE TABLE Plant ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, greenhouse_id INT, name VARCHAR(50), species VARCHAR(50), optimal_temperature FLOAT, optimal_humidity FLOAT )
CREATE TABLE Sensor ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, location VARCHAR(100), type VARCHAR(50), greenhouse_id INT )
